The best UK deals for Monday: Amazon devices, Xbox bundles, Nespresso coffee machines, and more

What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Joseph GreenMashable Deals2018-12-17 11:22:49 UTC

For many, this week is the last week of the year in the office before the Christmas holidays, and that is reason to celebrate. You could crack into the chocolates, or you could save on a selection of the best deals from across the internet. Or you could do both.

We are here to help you wind down in this final work week by hand-picking the best deals on personal care items, Amazon devices, Xbox bundles, and kitchen appliances. 

Personal care products make great stocking fillers, and you can pick up a number of items at great prices. You can save on a Oral-B Genius 9000 CrossAction electric toothbrush with a USB travel case, normally listed at £299.99, but currently available for just £84.99. You can also save over £200 on the Braun Series 7 electric shaver with a CleanandCharge station and travel case, that's down to £109.99.

Amazon devices are always very popular this time of year and it's no surprise as so many items are available at discounted rates. For example, the Fire TV Stick with Alexa voice remote is down to £24.99 from the usual price of £39.99. You can also save on the Amazon Echo (2nd Gen) that's reduced to £54.99 from £89.99.

Elsewhere in this deals round up you can save on an Xbox One S 1TB Battlefield V console and a Nespresso EN550.BM Lattissima Touch automatic coffee machine, alongside a whole load of other great deals. The pick of the deals in the KitchenAid Mini Stand Mixer that's down to £269.99 from £449.

These are the best deals from across the internet for Dec. 17.

Personal care

  • Oral-B Genius 9000 CrossAction Electric Toothbrush Rechargeable + USB Travel Case bundle — £84.99 (list price £299.99)

  • Braun Series 7 Electric Shaver + CleanandCharge Station + Travel Case — £109.99 (list price £329.99)

  • Philips S5420/06 AquaTouch Wet & Dry Men's Electric Shaver with Precision Trimmer — £60 (list price £170)

  • Philips Series 3000 Wet & Dry Men’s Electric Shaver with Pop-up Trimmer — £39.99 (list price £110)

  • Philips Sonicare ProtectiveClean 6100 Electric Toothbrush with Travel Case — £89.99 (list price £299.99)


Amazon devices

  • Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote — £24.99 (list price £39.99)

  • Amazon Echo (2nd Gen) — £54.99 (list price £89.99)

  • Echo Spot smart speaker with Alexa — £89.99 (list price £119.99)

  • Fire 7 Tablet with Alexa — £44.99 (list price £59.99)

  • Fire 7 Kids Edition Tablet — £79.99 (list price £99.99)


Xbox bundles

  • Xbox One S 1TB Battlefield V console — £199.99

  • Xbox One S 1TB Fortnite Console + Forza Horizon 4 - Standard Edition + Spyro Trilogy Reignited — £239.99

  • Xbox One X 1TB console Player Unknown's Battlegrounds Bundle — £399.99

  • Xbox One X 1TB Battlefield V Gold Rush bundle + Red Dead Redemption 2 — £399.99

  • Xbox One S 1TB Battlefield V + Just Cause 4 — £229.99


Kitchen appliances

  • Morphy Richards 480003 Health Fryer — £44.99 (list price £89.99)

  • Nespresso EN550.BM Lattissima Touch Automatic Coffee Machine — £149 (list price £279.99)

  • Kenwood FPM910 Multi-Pro Excel Food Processor — £242 (list price £439.99)

  • KitchenAid Mini Stand Mixer — £269.99 (list price £449)

  • Sage BJE520UK Nutri Juicer Plus Centrifugal Juicer — £164.99 (list price £219.95)

Topics: amazon, amazon alexa, kitchen-appliances, Mashable Deals, shopping-uk, Tech, uk-deals, xbox one, xbox-one-x
